extendedInfo.description: Play the first level for free! Learn your way is a educational game for kids from 2 to 6 years old. By matching images and words they will learn and play. The game has three levels.Kids will learn to memorize, recognize and fullfil tasks.Every level can be played again to try to get a higher score.Images are clear and child friendly, your kids will like them! They will also like to hear and recognize the game music.Userinterface fits kids needs, they can play it without parent's help.
